header.title: Class 16 – Athames 2
authors: Esoteric School of Shamanism and Magic

central_thesis: The Athame, as a primary magical tool, can be used for advanced energetic operations including banishment of unwanted entities, creation of psychic protection, severance of unhealthy energetic connections, and a wide array of specific healing modalities through precise projection and manipulation of colored energies.

structure_content.summary: This section introduces the practical video clips associated with the class, covering Area Banishments, Psychic Teflon, Cutting Lines, Pulling With the Athame, and Sweeping With the Athame, indicating a hands-on learning approach.

Details how to use an Athame to banish entities (ghosts, thought forms, spirits, astral projectors) from one's space. It describes both single banishments (with electric blue bolts) and a detailed 11-step area banishment procedure, emphasizing the use of electric blue energy to clear an entire property. It notes that archetypes can resist or reflect banishments.

Explains 'Psychic Teflon' as a protective energetic shield applied to the walls, ceilings, floors, and exterior surfaces of a house. This method uses electric blue flares projected from the Athame to prevent banished entities from returning and to block down-tone energies. It is recommended after a banishment and cleansing.

Provides a comprehensive 8-step ritual for severing 'sticky psychic lines' – unhealthy energetic connections that cause various physical and emotional symptoms. The technique involves using an Athame loaded with electric blue to make precise cuts around the person's body. Additional notes cover cutting specific lines and dealing with potential energetic repercussions from the originator of a line, including the use of a 'Lemniscate'.

Outlines diverse Athame-based healing techniques. This includes 'Sweeping' to remove excess/stagnant fire energies, 'Pulling' to extract localized pain, and specific applications for blood coagulation, frostbite, shock, scar tissue, kidney stones, blood clots, varicose veins, arthritis, and cancerous tumors. Each technique specifies Athame position, energy color, and method of application.

structure_content.chapter_title: 6. Exit Ritual, Day Greeting and Day Ending
structure_content.summary: Presents specific daily affirmations and invocations for a 'Day Greeting' and 'Day Ending', as well as a general 'Exit Ritual', all structured around invoking 'Sky Father', 'Earth Mother', 'Winds of Knowledge', and 'Winds of Power' while 'Being in Radiance'.

structure_content.chapter_title: 7. Additional Tools to Make or Buy
structure_content.summary: Lists recommended tools for magical practice, including guidelines for selecting or making a pendulum, a double-sided camping mirror, a Waite-Rider Tarot Deck, pliers for spellwork, two Books of Shadows (for readings and spells), specific Wisdom and Protection Candles, and candle carving tools with paints and brushes.

key_concepts.definition: A primary magical tool used to project, manipulate, cut, sweep, and pull subtle energies, especially colored energetic beams and flares, for purposes of banishment, protection, and healing.

A specific energy color described as highly uncomfortable for spirits, effective for banishment, and capable of forming protective shields. It can also disable or kill attackers when projected with force.

A type of protective energetic shield made of electric blue flares, applied to the surfaces of a house (walls, ceilings, floors, exterior) to prevent unwanted entities from returning and to block negative energies from becoming trapped.

Unhealthy energetic connections between individuals or to situations, manifesting as symptoms like sore spots, bad dreams, illness, or brooding over relationships. These can be severed using the Athame.

A healing technique using an Athame to create an energy blade of a specific color, which is then swept down a person's body to release excess or stagnant fire energies (pain, inflammation, congestion, tension).
A healing technique involving holding the Athame near an area of localized pain (e.g., burn, sprain) and using intention to pull out excess fire energy with an appropriate color, honoring body flows.

A 'heavy-duty technology' (energetic symbol) drawn in electric blue with an Athame and pushed back down a severed psychic line to its source, used in dire circumstances to teach the originator a strong lesson. Freedom from it requires complete letting go.
Powerful entities that banishments do not affect and which can, if targeted with electric blue, 'process the information' and 'throw a bolt back at you'.
A specific Athame holding position where the cutting edge faces right (or leading), used for projecting wider flares of energy, like applying Psychic Teflon.
A specific Athame holding position used for extending beams of energy from both butt and tip, and for creating energy blades for sweeping.

practical_system.description: The system described centers on the Athame as a focal point for the projection and manipulation of subtle energies, particularly specific color frequencies, to achieve practical magical results. Key principles involve conscious intention, visualization of energy (e.g., electric blue, red orange, water blue), and specific Athame holding positions ('edge on', 'flare') to direct energetic beams, flares, or blades. The system emphasizes direct energetic intervention to address psychic threats, unhealthy connections, and various physical ailments, often integrating a diagnostic step (e.g., checking how a person feels, observing color changes).
tools: Candle or Color Chip (for loading Athame with specific colors)
Paper and Pen (for specific line cutting ritual)
Pendulum (amethyst crystal on silver chain or natural fiber for divination/sensing)
Waite-Rider Tarot Deck (for readings, to be stored in natural material box/bag)
Books of Shadows (two; one for readings, one for spells)
Wisdom and Protection Candles (white, sky blue, or sun yellow taper candles for tarot readings)
Candle Carving Tool (leather stamping tool, awl, crochet hook for carving candles)
Watercolor or Acrylic Paints & Fine Brushes (for painting spellwork candles)
rituals: Single Banishment (throwing an electric blue bolt while commanding 'Go away and stay away!')
Area Banishment (a detailed 11-step process involving creating and moving sheets of electric blue energy to clear an entire property, culminating in a final flare to push entities out)
Psychic Teflon Application (a 6-step process for applying an electric blue protective shield to house surfaces using Athame flares)
Cutting Psychic Lines (an 8-step ritual for severing unhealthy energetic connections with electric blue beams, including a method for specific lines with a written affirmation)
Sweeping (an 8-step healing technique to remove excess/stagnant fire energies using an Athame energy blade of appropriate color, flicking excess energy off)
Pulling (a 4-step healing method for localized pain, drawing out excess fire with the Athame's butt/tip and appropriate colors)
Blood Coagulation (projecting Bright or Deep Red beam/flare to clot bleeding wounds)
Frost Bite Treatment (using a Deep Red flare to slowly melt ice crystals, followed by a Bright Red flare for normalization)
Shock Treatment (flaring the person from head to toe with Sun Yellow)
Scar Tissue Dissolution (repeatedly sweeping the area with Water Blue in 'edge on' position; or beaming Red Orange/Bright Red, sweeping Deep Red, pulling Deep Red, then washing with Water Blue)
Kidney Stone Dissolution (beaming Water Blue from Athame or using Water Blue cubes)
Blood Clot Dissolution (projecting a Water Blue beam into and through the clot)
Varicose Veins Treatment (sweeping with Electric Blue, then flaring with Water Blue)
Arthritis Relief (sweeping out Red Orange tension, then flowing/flaring Water Blue to clear calcium deposits)
Tumor and Cancer Treatment (projecting a Red Orange beam into the tumor, followed by a week's wait, then using hands/water cubes/Water Blue flares to break up dead cells)
Exit Ritual ('Sky Father And Earth Mother Being in Radiance I Greet You.')
Day Greeting ('Winds of Knowledge, Being in Radiance, I Bid You Good Morning.' and 'Winds of Power, Being in Radiance, I Bid You Good Morning.')
Day Ending ('Winds of Knowledge, Being in Radiance, I Bid You Good Night.' and 'Winds of Power, Being in Radiance, I Bid You Good Night.')

relevant_quotes.text: Remember, a person with a physical body is always more powerful than any spirit without a physical body.
Banishments do not work on archetypes; in fact, archetypes can throw bolts of electric blue back at you.
If you throw a strong bolt or beam of electric blue from your Athame at certain areas of the body (head, heart, solar plexus, etc.) you can disable or even kill an attacker.
The only way to be free of a Lemniscate is to let go completely.
Remember that sweeping takes energy out of the body.

critical_analysis.relevance: This text provides a highly practical and operative manual for advanced Athame use, relevant for practitioners seeking concrete methodologies for energetic defense, clearing, and healing within a modern magical paradigm. It details the precise application of color energies and Athame positions for specific magical outcomes, demonstrating a clear results-oriented approach. Its focus on 'electric blue' as a versatile energetic agent for protection and banishment is a distinctive feature, grounding esoteric concepts in tangible actions.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The target audience consists of students within the 'Esoteric School of Shamanism and Magic' who have foundational knowledge of Athame loading and basic energy manipulation. It is suitable for intermediate to advanced practitioners of practical magic, shamanism, or energy work who seek to expand their repertoire of energetic techniques for self-defense, property clearing, and healing using a magical blade.
